CarryingCamperMaxWalkSpeedPercent.Description: Speed modifier when carrying a survivor

ChainsawInitialTurnRate.Description: Initial turn rate when starting the chainsaw dash attack.

ChainsawFinalTurnRate.Description: Final turn rate that is set after the adjustment time of the chainsaw dash attack.

ChainsawTurnRateAdjustmentTime.Description: in s. After this amount we will set the final turn rate of the chainsaw dash

HillbillyChainsawLongDashDuration.Description: The amount of time to be considered a long dash.

ChainsawDashAttackZoneScaleFactor.Description: Scaling of the attack zone of chainsaw dash

ChainsawDashObstructionZoneScaleFactor.Description: Scaling of the obstruction zone of chainsaw dash

SlasherStealthIncreaseRate.Description: Rate at which stealth decreases as a percentage

ChainsawOverheatSprintMaxSpeed.Description: in cm. Max speed when sprinting while overheating

ChainsawOverheatSprintHitCooldownMultipl.Description: Reduction multiplier to the chainsaw sprint hit cooldown while overheated

ChainsawOverheatSprintObstructCooldownMu.Description: Reduction multiplier to the chainsaw sprint obstructed cooldown while overheated

ChainsawOverheatSprintMissCooldownMultip.Description: Reduction multiplier to the chainsaw sprint miss cooldown while overheated

ChargeChainsawOverheatActionSpeedAdditiv.Description: in %. Additive % to the action speed of the charge chainsaw interaction

ChainsawOverheatDuration.Description: in s. Duration of the overheat

ChainsawHeatMaxCharge.Description: Maximum amount of heat the Hillbilly chainsaw can hold

ChainsawHeatRevStartAmount.Description: Amount of heat gained when starting the rev the chainsaw

ChainsawHeatRevChargeRate.Description: Heat gained per second during the chainsaw rev

ChainsawHeatDashChargeRate.Description: Heat gained per second during the chainsaw dash

ChainsawHeatOnDashHit.Description: Heat gained when a survivor is hit with the chainsaw

ChainsawHeatDischargeRate.Description: Heat lost per second when not using the chainsaw

ChainsawHeatDecayDelay.Description: in s. Delay after using the chainsaw where we should start discharging heat

OverheatMaxSpeedAdjustmentTime.Description: in s. Adjustment time of the overheated max speed

OverheatRevInputActivationChargeBuffer.Description: in s. Buffer after which we should start the rev build-up
